0: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE AMOUNT OF TWO BILLION PESOS (PHP 2,000,000,000.00) FOR THE EXTENSION OF THE CAGAYAN DE ORO COASTAL BY-PASS ROAD FROM BARANGAY GUSA UP TO BARANGAY BUGO IN THE CITY OF CAGAYAN DE ORO, PROVINCE OF MISAMIS ORIENTAL AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
